      • onRequestPermissionResult

        public void onRequestPermissionResult(android.app.Activity activity,
                                      int requestCode,
                                      kotlin.Array[] grantResults,
                                      CardScannerPlugin.CardScannerPermissionDelegate delegate)

        Delegate Activity.onRequestPermissionsResult

        パラメータ:
        activity - activity
        requestCode - code requested
        grantResults - results
        delegate - if user select "never ask again", delegate callCardScannerPermissionDelegate.onNeverAskAgainCardScannerPermission
        関連項目:
        Activity.onRequestPermissionsResult

        Delegate Fragment.onRequestPermissionsResult

        パラメータ:

        requestCode - code requested
        grantResults - results
        delegate - if user select "never ask again", delegate callCardScannerPermissionDelegate.onNeverAskAgainCardScannerPermission

        Fragment.onRequestPermissionsResult
